Package StorageWrappers

Interface Summary
IDBWrapper A generic interface that decouples the implementation of the system from the actual DB that is chosen to be used
IFileWrapper A simple interface for storing and loading a model into a HDD based file.
 

Class Summary
StdFileWrapper A simple implementation of the IFileWrapper interface
TDBConfigFileReader A class that implements the logic behind reading the TDB config file This class enables the initialization of TDB that will be used for saving and loading the models
TDBWrapper The TDB based wrapper which implements the IDBWrapper interface
 

Enum Summary
RdfFormat Enum that represents the different RDF formats that could be used for printing or storing a model
